rules.name: Recent_Closed_Opportunity_Not_Ready_for_Sales_Engagement
rules.label: Recent Closed Opportunity / Not Ready for Sales Engagement

formulas.name: f_Converted_By
formulas.expression: IF( OR( CONTAINS({!$UserRole.Name},"Sales Team"), CONTAINS({!$UserRole.Name},"Standard Power Admin"), {!$UserRole.Name}="VP Sales" ), "Sales", IF(CONTAINS({!$UserRole.Name},"Marketing"), "Marketing", "Other") )

formulas.name: f_Manage_MQLs_Display
formulas.expression: CASE({!var_MQL_Action}, "Reject", "Reject MQLs", "Convert", "Convert MQL to Opportunity", "Add_to_Opportunity", "Add MQL to Open Opportunity", "Manage MQLs: Convert, Reject, or Add to Opportunity")

Flow.interviewLabel: MQL - SF - Convert, Reject, or Add to Opportunity {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: MQL - SF - Convert, Reject, or Add to Opportunity

fields.name: dt_Fault_Path
fields.fieldText:
Oops! Something went wrong.


Email the error message below with salesforce@erepublic.com for assistance.


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: dt_Oops_Already_Rejected_or_Converted
fields.fieldText:
{!tt_Manage_MQLs_Header}


Oops! At least one of these MQLs has already been Rejected or Converted.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_dt_Error_Screen_Inactive_Products
fields.fieldText:
{!tt_Manage_MQLs_Header}


Oops! At least one product is inactive and cannot be converted to an Opportunity.


Please go back and select a different product or different option.

fields.name: dt_Error_Screen_Inactive_Products
fields.fieldText:
{!tt_Manage_MQLs_Header}


Oops! At least one product is inactive and cannot be converted to an Opportunity.


Please go back and select a different product or different option.

fields.name: dt_Oops_No_MQL_Selected
fields.fieldText:
{!tt_Manage_MQLs_Header}



Oops! No MQLs were Selected. Go back and select at least one MQL.

fields.name: dt_Success_Add_to_Opp_Route_Single
fields.fieldText:
{!tt_Manage_MQLs_Header}


Success! The MQL has been added to the selected opportunity.

fields.name: dt_Success_Add_to_Opp_Route_Multiple
fields.fieldText:
{!tt_Manage_MQLs_Header}


Success! The MQLs have been added to selected opps.

fields.name: dt_Success_Convert_Route_Single
fields.fieldText:
{!tt_Manage_MQLs_Header}


Success! The MQL has been converted to an Opportunity.

fields.name: dt_Success_Convert_Route_Multiple
fields.fieldText:
{!tt_Manage_MQLs_Header}


Success! The MQLs have been converted to Opportunities.

fields.name: dt_Success_Rejection_Route_Multiple
fields.fieldText:
{!tt_Manage_MQLs_Header}


Success! The MQL has been updated.

fields.name: dt_Success_Rejection_Route_Single
fields.fieldText:
{!tt_Manage_MQLs_Header}


Success! The selected MQLs have been updated.
